resources.string: \ SudoBra is a game that integrates sudoku puzzle with mathematics implemented as part of a digital game based learning research project. The game is grouped into three levels where the first level(easy) provides just a 4 x 4 sudoku grid with lesser questions, the second level(medium) provides a 8 x 8 grid with less questions than the first and the third(difficult) sets more question with a 9 x 9 grid. Enjoy!

In the equation you are required to solve for x. The equation is in the form ax+b=c or ax-b=c, In solving equations with + sign you move the b to the c making it c-b and then divide your answer by a and that gives your solution. In an equation with the negative operation, you move b to c and this makes it to be c + b, then divide your answer by a to arrive at the required solution.
